item.description:
Free pool at a nice establishment. They have 10+ tables and it is rarely very busy. They have a full bar, food and many TV's. 2 TV's are huge-I think at least 10' or 12' wide!
I will give free pool lessons to anyone who desires during the first hour.

Menu link

More info:

Where is the Brewery Exchange located?
The Brewery Exchange is located at 201 Cabot Street in Lowell, MA. We are 25 minutes North of Boston and 30 minutes south of Manchester, NH. For directions to The Brewery Exchange visit our Find Us page. Website link

Is there parking available?
Yes. There is plenty of free parking. The Brewery Exchange parking lot is located directly across the street in the Notini Parking lot. Parking is safe, convenient and free during non event days.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be upstairs by the pool tables
item.name: Free pool at the Lowell Brewery Exchange and free pool lessons!
